meta.title: Add CI integration tests against test environment only
meta.summary: Add integration CI checks that target dm_brain_test and never prod.

task.objective: Add integration test CI job with explicit test environment targeting and prod safety guard.
constraints: Integration tests must never target prod project.
Do not expose secrets in workflow logs.

steps.instruction: Create `scripts/ci/check-test-env.sh` that fails when environment points to prod infrastructure.
Edit `.github/workflows/ci-baseline.yml` and add a job named `integration-test-testenv`.
In the new integration job, run `scripts/ci/check-test-env.sh` before running integration tests.
Configure integration test job to run only on pull requests and to consume test-scoped environment variables.
In `docs/DEPLOYMENT_INFRA_STATUS.md`, mark `TASK_10` as completed and record UTC timestamp.

expected_output: Integration tests are CI-gated and test-only.
stop_conditions: Stop and ask operator if integration test command is not yet defined.
